Begin by creating a new coordinate system at the origin (0, 0, 0) with no rotation. **Face 1** Create a loop with four lines on face 1 of the coordinate system: - Line 1: Start Point (0, 0), End Point (0.3409, 0) - Line 2: Start Point (0.3409, 0), End Point (0.3409, 0.2074) - Line 3: Start Point (0.3409, 0.2074), End Point (0, 0.2074) - Line 4: Start Point (0, 0.2074), End Point (0, 0) **Extrusion** Extrude the sketch along the normal direction by 0.0028 units, creating a 3D solid. The height, width, and length of this part are 0.0028, 0.3409, and 0.3409 units respectively. **<part\\_2> - Tapered Middle Section** Create a CAD model of a rectangular prism with a flat top and bottom, and a slightly tapered middle section. The model is symmetrical along the central axis. Begin by creating a new coordinate system at (0, 0, 0.0028) with no rotation. **Face 1** Create a loop with four lines on face 1 of the coordinate system: - Line 1: Start Point (0, 0), End Point (0.0057, 0) - Line 2: Start Point (0.0057, 0), End Point (0.0057, 0.2074) - Line 3: Start Point (0.0057, 0.2074), End Point (0, 0.2074) - Line 4: Start Point (0, 0.2074), End Point (0, 0) **Face 2** Create a loop with four lines on face 2 of the coordinate system: - Line 1: Start Point (0.3352, 0), End Point (0.3409, 0) - Line 2: Start Point (0.3409, 0), End Point (0.3409, 0.2074) - Line 3: Start Point (0.3409, 0.2074), End Point (0.3352, 0.2074) - Line 4: Start Point (0.3352, 0.2074), End Point (0.3352, 0) **Extrusion** Extrude the sketches along the normal direction by 0.7415 units, creating a 3D solid. The height, width, and length of this part are 0.7415, 0.3409, and 0.3409 units respectively. This part is joined with the previous CAD model to form a single, connected solid. The final CAD model is a rectangular prism with a flat top and bottom, and a slightly tapered middle section. The top and bottom sections are parallel to each other, while the middle section is slightly narrower than the top and bottom sections. The sides of the prism are straight and perpendicular to the top and bottom sections. The prism is centered on a white background. The height, width, and length of the final shape are approximately 0.7443, 0.3409, and 0.3409 units respectively.</description>
